actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution to disapprove the increase in salary for Members of Congress recommended by the President.

summary.text: Disapproves that part of the recommendations transmitted by the President to Congress, pursuant to the Federal Salary Act of 1967, which recommend rates of pay for Members of Congress and the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico.

titles.title: Resolution to disapprove the increase in salary for Members of Congress recommended by the President.
